metadata.inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to add a device to the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to add your smart dimmer, single press and release the manual/program button on
the smart dimmer
metadata.exclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to remove a device from the Z-Wave
network.
2. Once the controller is ready to remove your device, press and release the manual/program button on the smart dimmer
metadata.reset:
1. If plugged in, unplug the dimmer from the receptacle.
2. Press and hold the top button for at least three seconds while you plug the dimmer into a receptacle.
3. The LED will flash five times when completed successfully
